attributes.action: Require that all new computer users are given training
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As more and more people acquire computers, the proportion of computer users who are baffled and confused increases.

The internet, especially, can be a dangerous place, with viruses and other malware, phishing scams, stalkers and criminals.

We would like it to be mandatory for all new computer users to have basic introductory training in the safe and sensible use of computers and the internet.
